Citation Text: The present paper addresses this question by proposing a probabilistic parsing model trained on Negra (Skut et al, 1997), a syntactically annotated corpus for German
Reference Textt: The work reported in this paper aims at providing syntactically annotated corpora (treebanks') for stochastic grammar induction.

Citation Text: The annotation scheme (Skut et al, 1997) is modeled to a certain extent on that of the Penn Treebank (Marcuset al, 1993), with crucial differences
Reference Textt: These differences can be illustrated by a comparison with the Penn Treebank annotation scheme.
